page.description: Gets the active row in the specified Repeating Section.

argument.name: sectionName
argument.description: Repeating section use for source data.

argument.name: flagLogicalRowNumber
argument.description: Logical argument. True = add logical row number.

section.description: By default, the physical row number is returned. Deleted rows (which are hidden) are counted. To get the logical row number (which ignores deleted rows), specify true for the optional second argument.
